EmailTemplate.description: Used for 2013 JCI Dealer Program - Go Live email for new WSO accounts
EmailTemplate.name: JCI 2013 Go Live New WSO York
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Website Updates Are Complete!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
York | Yodle
Hello {!Account.00N60000002KwJ5} -
We have just launched your new YORK dealer website!
Now you have the ability to customize your dealer site. These customizations include things like:
Adding your company logo, testimonials and "About Us" information Promotions Additional services Adding pictures
Per your request we have disabled the Outrank optimization program that is included with the Liberties website program at no cost. Outrank is a convenient, easy-to-use online marketing solution that ranks your dealer website on page one of top search engines, driving more calls and emails to your business. In addition to placement, Outrank also assists with reputation management through the following features:
Pictimonial - A simple to use app for Android, iPhone and iPad that allows you to get customer testimonies in 4 easy steps Reputation Monitoring (Available to U.S. locations only.) - This valuable service allows you to see what is being said about your business on the web and by whom
Please reference the dealer website welcome kit for more information. In addition, you should have received another email from jciwebsites@yodle.com which contains your website URL and access information for your Yodle Dashboard. If you have not received this information or need help logging in, please email us at jciwebsites@yodle.com or call at 866-607-4050. Please also utilize this contact information if you would like to have us add any of the additional website customization options or the Outrank optimization strategy mentioned above to your dealer website.
Welcome to the 2013 Liberties Website Program!
Sincerely, JCI Website Support jciwebsites@yodle.com 866-607-4050
